com.javagameengine.assets.mesh

Class Mesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javagameengine.assets.NativeObject
      • com.javagameengine.assets.mesh.Mesh
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class Mesh
extends NativeObject
implements Drawable
    Stores the information describing a mesh and provides methods for manipulating the mesh or specifying openGL rendering parameters. The Mesh object is composed of a number of AttributeBuffers which are bound to the attributes specified in the Attribute enum.
